desc: Cost for running Node.js backend servers or Lambda functions to handle requests from 10,000 users.
Cost for PostgreSQL database service to store user data, orders, and other application information.
Cost for Object Storage to host images, videos, and other static content used by the app.
Cost for Monitoring Tool to keep track of system performance, uptime, and logs for debugging and analysis.
Cost for data transfer between different components of the app and external services, including ingress and egress traffic.
